#summary How to build morda in mac os x.

= How to build morda in Mac OS X =

== Step by step instructions ==

  # Download .tgz file of *GLEW* from [http://sourceforge.net/projects/glew/files/glew/1.10.0/glew-1.10.0.tgz/download here]. Install it:
{{{
tar zxvf glew-1.10.0.tar
cd glew-1.10.0
make
sudo make install
}}}
  # Download *zlib* from [http://zlib.net/zlib-1.2.8.tar.gz here] and install it:
{{{
tar zxvf zlib-1.2.8.tar.gz
cd zlib-1.2.8
./configure
make
sudo make install
}}}
  # Download *libpng* from [http://sourceforge.net/projects/libpng/files/libpng16/1.6.6/libpng-1.6.6.tar.gz/download here] and install:
{{{
tar zxvf libpng-1.6.6
cd libpng-1.6.6
./configure
make
sudo make install
}}}
  # Download *libjpeg* from [http://ijg.org/files/jpegsrc.v9.tar.gz here] and install it:
{{{
tar zxvf jpegsrc.v9.tar
cd jpeg-9
./configure
make
sudo make install
}}}
  # Download *libfreetype* from [http://sourceforge.net/projects/freetype/files/freetype2/2.4.11/freetype-2.4.11.tar.gz/download here] and install:
{{{
tar zxvf freetype-2.4.11.tar
cd freetype-2.4.11
./configure
make
sudo make install
sudo ln -s /usr/local/include/freetype2/freetype/ /usr/local/include/freetype
}}}
  # Check out *ting* sources to some directory, say */d/ting*:
{{{
svn co http://ting.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ ting
cd ting
make
make install
}}}
  # Check out *stob* sources to some directory, say */d/stob*:
{{{
svn co http://stob.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ stob
cd stob
make
make install
}}}
